Items.Title: Application no. 20145032 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Brasserie Cognac East Corp, d/b/a Brasserie Cognac Cafe, for a revocable consent to modify and continue to maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 963 Lexington, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 8, Council District 4. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(e) of the New York City Administrative Code.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, Sidewalk café, 963 Lexington, Manhattan (20145032 TCM)

Items.Title: Application no. 20145032 TCM, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Brasserie Cognac East Corp, d/b/a Brasserie Cognac Cafe, for a revocable consent to modify and continue to maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 963 Lexington, Borough of Manhattan, Community District 8, Council District 4. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(e) of the New York City Administrative Code.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Zoning, Sidewalk café, 963 Lexington, Manhattan (20145032 TCM)
